name: Joan Wasser

last_movies.title: 哈利路亚：莱昂纳德·科恩，一段旅程，一首歌

introduction: Joan Wasser (born July 26, 1970), known by her stage name Joan As Police Woman, is an American musician, singer-songwriter and producer. She began her career playing violin with the Dambuilders and played with Black Beetle, Antony and the Johnsons, and Those Bastard Souls. Since 2004 she has released her solo material as Joan As Police Woman. She has released five regular studio albums, one EP, a number of singles and a collection of covers.[1] Throughout her career, she has regularly collaborated with other artists as a writer, performer and arranger.[2]
